Harslem'> <organization>Rand Corporation</organization></author> <author initials='J.' surname='Heafner' fullname='J. Heafner'> <organization>Rand Corporation</organization></author> <date year='1970' day='27' month='March' /> <abstract> <t>We have recently discussed NWG/RFC Nos. 36 and 39,with Steve Crocker, UCLA.  Steve has asked that we elaborate on the errors, queries, and HOST status that were mentioned in NWG/RFC #39.</t></abstract></front>  <seriesInfo name='RFC' value='40' /> <format type='TXT' octets='3825' target='http://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc40.txt' /> </reference>
